tours.title: Sunrise View Safari
tours.description: Experience the ultimate desert adventure with Sunrise View Safari. Start your day with an adrenaline rush and create memories that will last a lifetime!
tours.description2: Embark on the ultimate desert adventure with Sunrise View Safari! Relax with convenient pickup and drop-off in our sleek, well-maintained 4x4 vehicles. Guided by an expert safari leader, you'll explore the stunning desert landscape through heart-pounding dune bashing and exciting sandboarding. Pause for a breathtaking photostop among the golden dunes, perfect for capturing unforgettable memories. Begin your day with a surge of excitement and create experiences you'll cherish forever. Join us for a truly unforgettable sunrise adventure!

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel or Residence Dubai
inclusions.vehicle: Pick up by: 4x4 Land Cruiser for the Adventurous safari & Camp
inclusions.tire_preparation: Convoy and deflate the tire pressure before embarking for dune bashing
inclusions.photo_stop: Dune Bashing and drive to reach the high Dune (with photo stop)
inclusions.dune_bashing: 45 Minutes Desert Dune Bashing at Dubai 2nd Biggest Desert Lahbab Desert (Known of it Red Dunes) by Professional Safari License Driver
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your hotel or Residence Dubai

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing experience! The sunrise view was breathtaking and the dune bashing was thrilling. Our guide Ahmed was fantastic and made sure we felt safe throughout the adventure. Highly recommend this tour!

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: Great desert safari experience! The sandboarding was fun and the photo opportunities were perfect. The only minor issue was the pickup was 15 minutes late, but overall a wonderful day.

reviews.name: Emma Williams
reviews.comment: Perfect sunrise safari! The dune bashing was exhilarating and our guide was very professional. The sunrise photos we took are absolutely stunning. Worth every dirham!

tours.title: Thrilling Red Dune Desert Safari
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Thrilling Red Dune Desert Safari in the stunning Lahbab Desert! Experience exhilarating dune bashing and sandboarding.

reviews.name: David Rodriguez
reviews.comment: Fantastic red dune safari! The dune bashing was intense and the entertainment at the camp was excellent. The belly dancing show was mesmerizing. Great value for money!

reviews.name: Lisa Thompson
reviews.comment: Amazing experience from start to finish! The red dunes are absolutely beautiful and the sandboarding was so much fun. Our guide was knowledgeable and friendly. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: James Wilson
reviews.comment: Good safari experience overall. The dune bashing was thrilling and the dinner was delicious. The only downside was the camp was quite crowded, but still enjoyable.

tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Thrilling Red Dune Desert Safari in the breathtaking Lahbab Desert! Enjoy the excitement of dune bashing and sandboarding, guided by a professional safari expert. Convenient pickup and drop-off from your Dubai location in a comfortable 4x4 vehicle ensure a seamless experience. Capture stunning moments during our photo stop amid the vast desert landscape, then relax at our welcoming camp with complimentary tea, coffee, and snacks. Savor a delicious dinner with both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, complemented by captivating live entertainment, including belly dancing and Tanura performances. Don't miss this extraordinary chance to explore the desert's enchanting beauty—join us for a day filled with thrills and culture that you'll cherish forever!
tours.title2: Thrilling Red Dune Desert Safari Dubai

tours.title: Desert Safari with Bab Al Shams Dinner
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Desert Safari and Bab Al Shams Dinner experience!

reviews.name: Maria Garcia
reviews.comment: Absolutely luxurious experience! The Bab Al Shams dinner was exquisite and the desert safari was thrilling. Perfect combination of adventure and luxury. The resort setting was breathtaking.

reviews.name: Robert Kim
reviews.comment: Fantastic tour with amazing food at Bab Al Shams. The desert activities were exciting and the dinner experience was world-class. Highly recommend for special occasions!

reviews.name: Sophie Anderson
reviews.comment: Perfect romantic getaway! The sunset views were incredible and the dinner at Bab Al Shams was unforgettable. Our guide was professional and made the experience magical.

tours.title2: Desert Safari with Bab Al Shams Dinner
tours.description2: Embark on a remarkable journey with our Desert Safari and Bab Al Shams Dinner experience! Your adventure begins with convenient pickup in a comfortable 4x4 vehicle. Experience the adrenaline rush of dune bashing and the fun of sandboarding as you navigate the golden desert dunes. Pause to capture unforgettable moments during a photo stop against the stunning desert backdrop. As the day transitions to night, indulge in a sumptuous dinner at the luxurious Bab Al Shams resort, accompanied by enchanting live entertainment that will captivate your senses. This perfect blend of adventure and elegance awaits—book your experience today!

tours.title: Overnight Desert Safari
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable Overnight Desert Safari, where adventure meets luxury.

reviews.name: James Wilson
reviews.comment: Incredible overnight experience! Sleeping under the stars was magical and the morning sunrise was breathtaking. The camp was comfortable and the entertainment was fantastic.

reviews.name: Emma Thompson
reviews.comment: Amazing adventure! The overnight stay added so much to the experience. The desert at night is truly magical. Highly recommend for anyone wanting a unique Dubai experience.

reviews.name: Ahmed Hassan
reviews.comment: Perfect family experience! The kids loved the overnight camping and the adults enjoyed the entertainment. The breakfast in the morning was delicious and the sunrise views were incredible.

tours.description2: Experience the magic of an Overnight Desert Safari, where adventure blends seamlessly with luxury! Your journey begins with a professional safari guide picking you up in a 4x4 vehicle, ready to navigate Dubai's majestic dunes. Feel the thrill of dune bashing and the excitement of sandboarding across golden sands. Pause to capture stunning photos amidst the endless desert landscape.As the sun sets, enjoy refreshing tea and coffee before indulging in a delectable dinner accompanied by enchanting live performances, including mesmerizing belly dancing, colorful Tanura shows, and breathtaking fire acts. Spend the night under a star-studded sky in our cozy desert camp for an authentic experience like no other. Awaken to a hearty breakfast as the sun casts its golden glow over the dunes before we return you to your location. This magical escape promises unforgettable memories. Book your adventure today!

tours.title: Private Morning Desert Safari
tours.description: Experience the thrill of a Private Morning Desert Safari in Dubai like never before.

reviews.name: Lisa Chen
reviews.comment: Perfect private experience! Having the vehicle to ourselves made it so much more intimate and enjoyable. The morning light on the dunes was absolutely stunning.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.comment: Excellent private safari! The guide was knowledgeable and the morning timing was perfect for photography. Worth the extra cost for the private experience.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Amazing private tour! The flexibility to go at our own pace was fantastic. The morning desert is so peaceful and beautiful. Highly recommend!

tours.description2: Discover the excitement of a Private Morning Desert Safari in Dubai like never before! Begin your adventure with a seamless pickup in a luxurious 4x4 Land Cruiser or Nissan Patrol, offering the perfect blend of comfort and style. Guided by a professional safari expert, experience the adrenaline rush of dune bashing and the thrill of sandboarding across golden sands.Pause to capture incredible photos of the stunning desert scenery, creating memories to last a lifetime. This exclusive experience promises adventure, luxury, and breathtaking views. Don't wait—book your private morning desert escape today!

tours.title: Early Morning Desert Safari
tours.description: Embark on the ultimate Early Morning Desert Safari in the breathtaking Lahbab Desert! Led by our expert safari guides, you'll experience an exhilarating adventure filled with heart-pounding dune bashing and thrilling sand boarding. .

reviews.name: Jessica Adams
reviews.comment: Fantastic morning safari! The early start was worth it for the beautiful morning light. The dune bashing was thrilling and the sandboarding was so much fun.

reviews.name: Ryan O'Connor
reviews.comment: Great morning adventure! The cooler temperatures made it more comfortable and the morning views were spectacular. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

reviews.name: Priya Sharma
reviews.comment: Amazing morning experience! The desert looks completely different in the morning light. The guide was excellent and made the adventure memorable.

reviews.name: David Miller
reviews.comment: Perfect morning adventure! The early start was worth it for the beautiful sunrise views. The dune bashing was thrilling and the sandboarding was so much fun.

reviews.name: Jennifer Lee
reviews.comment: Great morning safari! The early timing meant cooler temperatures and fewer crowds. The guide was excellent and made the experience memorable.

reviews.name: Carlos Rodriguez
reviews.comment: Amazing early morning experience! The desert looks completely different in the morning light. Perfect for photography and adventure lovers.

tours.description2: Embark on the ultimate Early Morning Desert Safari in the stunning Lahbab Desert! Guided by our expert safari team, get ready for an action-packed adventure featuring thrilling dune bashing and exciting sandboarding. Enjoy seamless pickup from your hotel or apartment in a luxurious 4x4 Land Cruiser or Nissan Patrol, ensuring comfort and style.Stay hydrated with complimentary water bottles, and don't forget to snap incredible photos at our scenic desert stop. This unforgettable desert experience is waiting for you—book now and create memories that will last a lifetime!

pick.pickup_and_drop_off: Morning desert safari packages that include convenient pick-up and drop-off services from hotels in Dubai. This ensures hassle-free transportation to and from the desert.
pick.dune_bashing: The thrill of dune bashing is one of the highlights of a desert safari, in which skilled drivers maneuver 4x4 vehicles over sand dunes.
pick.sand_boarding: Morning desert safari packages include sand boarding, which involves sliding down sand dunes on specially designed boards, similar to snowboarding.
pick.professional_guide: An experienced guide often accompanies the safari to provide information about the desert environment, local customs, and answer participants' questions.
pick.duration: Morning desert safaris last for 3-4 hours, so participants can experience the beauty of the desert without taking up the entire day.
pick.desert_activities: You can include additional desert activities, such as camel ride, dune buggy rides, or falconry displays, to provide participants with a variety of experiences.
pick.refreshments: Water bottles are typically provided to keep participants hydrated and energized during the safari.
pick.safety_equipment: Participants are usually provided with safety equipment such as seat belts in vehicles and helmets for certain activities such as quad biking and dune buggy rides.
pick.photography_opportunities: While on safari, tourists have ample opportunities to capture stunning photographs of the desert landscape, camel rides, and other activities.

excluded.breakfast: Before or after the safari, participants are usually responsible for their own meals. Breakfast is usually not included in morning desert safari packages.
excluded.optional_activities: The standard safari package usually does not include optional activities such as souvenir shopping, photography services, or additional adventure activities.
excluded.personal_expenses: Souvenirs, personal purchases, tips for guides or drivers, and any other personal expenses are not typically included in safari prices.
excluded.outside_designated_areas: If the participant's hotel is outside the designated pick-up/drop-off areas, transport to and from the safari starting point may incur additional charges.
excluded.guide_gratuities: Tipping the safari guide and driver is not typically included in the safari price and is at the discretion of the participants.
excluded.language_specific_guides: There may be an additional fee if participants require a guide who speaks a language other than the safari's default language.

tours.title: Private Sunrise Desert Safari
tours.description: Experience the thrill of adventure with our Private Sunrise Desert Safari in the stunning Lahbab Desert!.

reviews.name: Anna Kowalski
reviews.comment: Absolutely magical sunrise experience! Having the desert to ourselves was incredible. The sunrise over the dunes was breathtaking and the private tour made it so special.

reviews.name: Thomas Mueller
reviews.comment: Perfect private sunrise safari! The early morning light was perfect for photography and the private experience made it so much more intimate. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Isabella Santos
reviews.comment: Beautiful sunrise tour! The private vehicle made the experience so much better. The guide was excellent and the sunrise views were unforgettable.

tours.description2: Experience the ultimate thrill with our Private Sunrise Desert Safari in the breathtaking Lahbab Desert! Enjoy exclusive pickup from your hotel or apartment in a luxurious 4x4 Land Cruiser or Nissan Patrol. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you conquer the dunes with exhilarating dune bashing and test your skills at sandboarding.Capture unforgettable moments against the backdrop of vast, golden sands during our scenic photo stop. tours.title: Evening Desert Safari
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable Evening Desert Safari and experience the magic of the dunes! .

reviews.name: Rachel Green
reviews.comment: Perfect evening safari! The sunset views were absolutely stunning and the entertainment was fantastic. The belly dance and Tanura shows were incredible.

reviews.name: Mark Taylor
reviews.comment: Great evening experience! The dune bashing was thrilling and the dinner was delicious. The entertainment kept us engaged throughout the evening.

reviews.name: Nina Patel
reviews.comment: Amazing evening safari! The sunset was breathtaking and the camp atmosphere was perfect. The food was excellent and the shows were entertaining.

tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable Evening Desert Safari and immerse yourself in the magic of the dunes! Your adventure begins with convenient pickup in a luxurious 4x4, guided by an expert safari professional. Feel the thrill of dune bashing and unleash your inner adventurer with exciting sandboarding. Capture breathtaking moments during our scenic photo stop amidst the stunning desert landscapes.Arrive at our welcoming camp to unwind with refreshing tea, coffee, and delicious snacks under the starlit sky. Enjoy a sumptuous dinner featuring a variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, followed by mesmerizing live performances, including belly dancing, Tanura dance, and spectacular fire shows.Join us for an evening filled with excitement, culture, and culinary delights—your unforgettable desert adventure awaits!

tours.title: Camel Trekking Dubai
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with Camel Trekking Dubai! Experience the serene beauty of the desert as you ride atop these majestic creatures for a one-hour journey through stunning landscapes.

reviews.name: Olivia Martinez
reviews.comment: Amazing camel trekking experience! The camels were gentle and the desert views were breathtaking. Perfect for a peaceful adventure in the desert.

reviews.name: Daniel Kim
reviews.comment: Great camel trekking tour! The one-hour ride was perfect and the desert scenery was beautiful. The guides were knowledgeable about the camels.

reviews.name: Sophie Williams
reviews.comment: Perfect family activity! The kids loved riding the camels and the adults enjoyed the peaceful desert experience. Highly recommend!

tours.description2: Embark on an extraordinary journey with Camel Trekking Dubai! Immerse yourself in the tranquil beauty of the desert as you ride atop majestic camels on a captivating one-hour trek through breathtaking landscapes. With seamless pickup and drop-off from your hotel or apartment, this cultural adventure is as convenient as it is unforgettable.Don't miss this incredible chance to connect with nature and experience the charm of Dubai's enchanting dunes. Create memories that will last a lifetime—book your camel trekking adventure today!

tours.title: Private Evening Desert Safari Dubai
tours.description: Experience the ultimate adventure with our Private Evening Desert Safari! Enjoy seamless pickup and drop-off from your hotel or apartment, as you embark on a thrilling 4x4 ride through stunning dunes.

reviews.name: Alexander Petrov
reviews.comment: Exceptional private evening safari! Having the vehicle to ourselves made the experience so much more intimate. The sunset views were incredible and the service was top-notch.

reviews.name: Elena Volkov
reviews.comment: Perfect private experience! The flexibility to customize our itinerary was fantastic. The guide was professional and the evening entertainment was outstanding.

reviews.name: Marcus Johnson
reviews.comment: Great private safari! The exclusive experience was worth the premium price. The sunset was beautiful and the private vehicle made it so much more comfortable.

tours.description2: Experience the pinnacle of adventure with our Private Evening Desert Safari! Begin with seamless pickup and drop-off from your hotel or apartment, and set off on a thrilling 4x4 journey across mesmerizing dunes. Feel the excitement of dune bashing, try your hand at sandboarding, and capture stunning moments during a photo stop in the heart of the desert.Immerse yourself in the charm of traditional camp activities, including a serene camel ride and intricate henna painting for ladies. The evening comes alive with captivating live performances, including belly dancing, a colorful Tanura dance, and an electrifying fire show.Join us for a magical evening under the stars where adventure blends with cultural wonders—book your unforgettable desert experience today!

tours.title: Private Desert Safari BBQ Dinner
tours.description: Experience the allure of the Arabian desert with our exclusive Private Desert Safari BBQ Dinner. This adventure combines thrilling dune bashing, cultural experiences, and a sumptuous BBQ dinner under the stars, offering an unforgettable evening amidst the golden sands.

reviews.name: Victoria Chen
reviews.comment: Exceptional private BBQ dinner experience! The food was delicious and the private setting made it so intimate. The sunset views were breathtaking and the service was impeccable.

reviews.name: Roberto Silva
reviews.comment: Amazing private BBQ dinner! The food was excellent and the desert setting was perfect. The private experience made it so much more special than group tours.

reviews.name: Grace Thompson
reviews.comment: Perfect romantic dinner experience! The private BBQ dinner under the stars was magical. The food was delicious and the desert atmosphere was incredible.

tours.description2: Join us for a private desert safari that begins with a comfortable pickup from your location in a luxury 4x4 vehicle. Your adventure starts with an exhilarating dune bashing session, navigating the mesmerizing dunes of the Arabian desert. As the sun sets, capture stunning photographs of the desert landscape bathed in golden hues. Upon arrival at our traditional Bedouin-style camp, immerse yourself in cultural activities such as henna painting, shisha smoking, and dressing in traditional Arabic attire. The evening culminates with a delectable BBQ dinner, featuring a variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, accompanied by live entertainment including Tanoura and fire shows. After a memorable evening, you'll be escorted back to your accommodation, cherishing the enchanting desert memories.

pick.transportation: Private pickup and drop-off in a luxury 4x4 vehicle from your hotel or residence.
pick.dune_bashing: Thrilling dune bashing experience with a professional driver.
pick.sunset_photography: Opportunity to capture stunning sunset views over the desert.
pick.henna_painting: Traditional henna tattooing available at the camp.
pick.shisha: Access to a shisha smoking area with a variety of flavors.
pick.arabic_attire: Dress in traditional Arabic costumes for photographs.
pick.bbq_dinner: Sumptuous BBQ dinner with vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.
pick.live_entertainment: Live performances including Tanoura and fire shows.
pick.refreshments: Unlimited soft drinks, water, tea, and coffee.

excluded.alcoholic_beverages: Alcoholic drinks are not included but may be available for purchase at the camp.
excluded.quad_biking: Quad biking is available as an optional activity at an additional cost.
excluded.personal_expenses: Any additional purchases made at the camp, such as souvenirs, are not included.
excluded.gratuities: Tips for guides and drivers are not included and are at your discretion.
excluded.special_dietary_requests: While efforts are made to accommodate special dietary needs, specific requests should be communicated in advance.

tours.title: Desert Safari with Overnight Stay
tours.description: Experience the enchantment of the Arabian desert with our Desert Safari with Overnight Stay package. This adventure combines thrilling activities, cultural immersion, and a serene overnight camping experience under the starry desert sky.

reviews.name: Lucas Anderson
reviews.comment: Incredible overnight experience! Sleeping under the stars was magical and the morning sunrise was breathtaking. The camp was comfortable and the entertainment was fantastic.

reviews.name: Maya Patel
reviews.comment: Perfect overnight adventure! The desert at night is truly magical and the morning breakfast was delicious. The guide was excellent and made the experience unforgettable.

reviews.name: James Wilson
reviews.comment: Amazing overnight safari! The camping experience was comfortable and the morning views were incredible. Highly recommend for anyone wanting a unique desert experience.

tours.description2: Join us for an unforgettable Desert Safari with Overnight Stay. Begin your adventure with thrilling dune bashing and sandboarding, followed by a traditional camel ride. Witness the breathtaking desert sunset and immerse yourself in Bedouin culture at our authentic camp. Indulge in a delicious BBQ dinner, enjoy live entertainment, and relax with stargazing before retiring to your comfortable tent for the night. Wake up to a refreshing morning and a delightful breakfast to complete your desert experience.

pick.transportation: Private pickup and drop-off in a 4x4 vehicle from your hotel or residence.
pick.dune_bashing: Exhilarating dune bashing experience with an expert driver.
pick.sandboarding: Slide down the sandy dunes on a sandboard.
pick.camel_ride: Traditional camel ride through the desert.
pick.bedouin_camp: Immerse yourself in Bedouin culture at an authentic camp.
pick.bbq_dinner: Enjoy a sumptuous BBQ dinner with vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.
pick.live_entertainment: Watch live performances, including traditional dances.
pick.stargazing: Relax under the starry desert sky.
pick.overnight_stay: Stay overnight in a comfortable tent with provided bedding.
pick.breakfast: Wake up to a delightful morning breakfast.

excluded.alcoholic_beverages: Alcoholic drinks are not included but may be available for purchase at the camp.
excluded.quad_biking: Quad biking is available as an optional activity at an additional cost.
excluded.personal_expenses: Additional purchases such as souvenirs are not included.
excluded.gratuities: Tips for guides and drivers are not included and are at your discretion.

tours.title: Evening Safari with Quad Bike
tours.description: Experience the ultimate desert adventure with our Evening Safari featuring an exhilarating quad bike ride! Combine the thrill of dune bashing with the excitement of quad biking for an unforgettable evening in the desert.

reviews.name: Alex Thompson
reviews.comment: Amazing quad bike experience! The 30-minute ride was thrilling and the evening safari was perfect. The combination of dune bashing and quad biking was incredible.

reviews.name: Sarah Mitchell
reviews.comment: Great evening adventure! The quad bikes were in excellent condition and the desert views were stunning. The evening entertainment was fantastic.

reviews.name: David Rodriguez
reviews.comment: Perfect quad bike safari! The evening timing was ideal and the quad bike ride was so much fun. The dinner and entertainment were excellent.

tours.description2: Embark on an extraordinary desert adventure with our Evening Safari featuring an exhilarating quad bike experience! Your journey begins with a comfortable pickup in a luxurious 4x4 Land Cruiser, ready to take you through the stunning Lahbab Desert. Feel the adrenaline rush as you conquer the dunes with both dune bashing and a thrilling 30-minute quad bike ride. Capture breathtaking moments during our scenic photo stop, then unwind at our traditional desert camp. Enjoy authentic Arabian hospitality with tea, coffee, and delicious refreshments. As the evening unfolds, indulge in a sumptuous buffet dinner while being entertained by mesmerizing belly dance and Tanura performances under the starlit sky. This perfect blend of adventure and culture awaits you—book your unforgettable desert experience today!
tours.title2: Evening Safari with Quad Bike Dubai

tours.title: Dinner in Desert
tours.description: Experience the magic of an Arabian night with our exclusive Dinner in Desert package! Enjoy authentic cuisine, cultural entertainment, and the enchanting atmosphere of the desert under the stars.

reviews.name: Emma Watson
reviews.comment: Magical dinner experience! The desert setting was perfect and the food was delicious. The entertainment was fantastic and the atmosphere was incredible.

reviews.name: Tom Hanks
reviews.comment: Great desert dinner! The traditional welcome was lovely and the buffet dinner was excellent. The belly dance and Tanura shows were entertaining.

reviews.name: Jennifer Lawrence
reviews.comment: Perfect romantic dinner! The desert atmosphere was magical and the food was delicious. The entertainment kept us engaged throughout the evening.

tours.description2: Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of an Arabian night with our exclusive Dinner in Desert experience! Begin your evening with a traditional welcome featuring aromatic Arabic coffee and tea, accompanied by sweet dates and fresh fruits. Relax in our authentic desert camp setting, where you can enjoy the fragrant flavors of apple-scented sheesha and the traditional 'Hubbly Bubbly' smoking experience. Engage in cultural activities like camel riding, sandboarding, and intricate henna painting. As the night unfolds, indulge in a sumptuous international buffet dinner featuring both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, including delicious barbeque specialties. The evening comes alive with mesmerizing entertainment, including a captivating belly dance performance and the colorful Tanura dance show, all set against the backdrop of our spectacular light and sound display. This magical desert dining experience promises unforgettable memories under the starlit sky!

tours.title: Morning Desert Safari + Quad Bike
tours.description: Experience the perfect blend of adventure with our Morning Desert Safari featuring an exhilarating quad bike ride! Start your day with dune bashing and quad biking in the stunning Lahbab Desert.

reviews.name: Chris Evans
reviews.comment: Perfect morning adventure! The quad bike ride was thrilling and the morning desert views were stunning. Great way to start the day with adventure.

reviews.name: Scarlett Johansson
reviews.comment: Excellent morning safari! The quad bikes were in great condition and the morning light was perfect for photography. The guide was knowledgeable.

reviews.name: Robert Downey Jr.
reviews.comment: Amazing morning experience! The combination of dune bashing and quad biking was perfect. The morning desert is so peaceful and beautiful.

tours.description2: Kickstart your day with an unforgettable adventure in the desert! Our Morning Desert Safari with Quad Bike package offers the perfect combination of excitement and natural beauty. Begin your journey with a comfortable pickup in a luxurious 4x4 Land Cruiser, ready to take you through the stunning Lahbab Desert. Experience the thrill of 45 minutes of dune bashing with our professional licensed drivers, followed by an exhilarating 30-minute quad bike ride across the golden sands. Capture breathtaking moments during our scenic photo stop as the sun rises over the majestic dunes. Stay refreshed with complimentary soft drinks and water, and try your hand at sandboarding for an extra dose of adventure. This morning escapade promises an unforgettable start to your day in Dubai!
tours.title2: Morning Desert Safari + Quad Bike Dubai

tours.title: Jeep Safari Dubai
tours.description: Experience the thrill of a traditional desert adventure with our Jeep Safari Dubai! Enjoy dune bashing, cultural activities, and a sumptuous dinner under the stars.

reviews.name: Brad Pitt
reviews.comment: Fantastic jeep safari! The dune bashing was thrilling and the cultural activities were engaging. The dinner under the stars was magical.

reviews.name: Angelina Jolie
reviews.comment: Great desert experience! The jeep safari was exciting and the traditional camp activities were fun. The entertainment was excellent.

reviews.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
reviews.comment: Amazing jeep safari! The sunset views were breathtaking and the dinner was delicious. The cultural experience was authentic and memorable.

tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable desert adventure with our Jeep Safari Dubai! Your journey begins with a comfortable pickup in a luxurious 4x4 Toyota Land Cruiser, ready to take you through the stunning desert landscape. Experience the thrill of dune bashing with our professional licensed drivers, and capture breathtaking moments during our sunset photo stop. Arrive at our traditional desert camp where you'll be welcomed with aromatic Arabic coffee and tea, accompanied by sweet dates and fresh fruits. Enjoy the authentic atmosphere with sheesha and 'Hubbly Bubbly' smoking facilities. Engage in cultural activities like camel riding, sandboarding, and henna painting. As the evening unfolds, indulge in a sumptuous international buffet dinner featuring both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. The night comes alive with mesmerizing entertainment, including belly dance performances, Tanura shows, and a spectacular fire show. This complete desert experience promises unforgettable memories under the starlit sky!

tours.title: VIP Desert Safari Dubai
tours.description: Experience the ultimate luxury desert adventure with our VIP Desert Safari Dubai! Enjoy premium services, cultural activities, and exclusive entertainment in the heart of the desert.

reviews.name: Will Smith
reviews.comment: Exceptional VIP experience! The premium services were outstanding and the exclusive entertainment was incredible. Worth every penny for the luxury experience.

reviews.name: Margot Robbie
reviews.comment: Perfect VIP safari! The luxury amenities were fantastic and the exclusive cultural activities were engaging. The premium service made it so special.

reviews.name: Ryan Reynolds
reviews.comment: Amazing VIP experience! The premium services were excellent and the exclusive entertainment was fantastic. The luxury setting was perfect.

tours.description2: Indulge in the ultimate desert experience with our VIP Desert Safari Dubai! Your journey begins with a comfortable pickup in a luxurious 4x4 Toyota Land Cruiser, ready to take you through the stunning desert landscape. Experience the thrill of dune bashing with our professional licensed drivers. Arrive at our exclusive desert camp where you'll be welcomed with aromatic Arabic coffee and tea, accompanied by sweet dates and fresh fruits. Enjoy the premium atmosphere with apple-flavored sheesha and 'Hubbly Bubbly' smoking facilities. Engage in cultural activities like camel riding, sandboarding, and henna painting. As the evening unfolds, indulge in a sumptuous international buffet dinner featuring both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. The night comes alive with mesmerizing entertainment, including belly dance performances, Tanura shows, a spectacular fire show, and an exclusive falcon show. This VIP desert experience promises unforgettable memories under the starlit sky!

tours.title: Hatta Tour from Dubai
tours.description: Discover the natural beauty and cultural heritage of Hatta with our exclusive tour from Dubai! Experience mountain tracking, heritage sites, and refreshing pools in this unique desert oasis.

reviews.name: Gal Gadot
reviews.comment: Amazing Hatta tour! The mountain tracking was challenging and the heritage sites were fascinating. The refreshing pools were perfect after the hike.

reviews.name: Henry Cavill
reviews.comment: Great mountain adventure! The Hatta tour was exciting and the cultural heritage sites were interesting. The guide was knowledgeable about the area.

reviews.name: Amy Adams
reviews.comment: Perfect nature escape! The mountain tracking was beautiful and the heritage sites were educational. The refreshing pools were a great reward.

tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable journey to Hatta, a hidden gem in the UAE! Your adventure begins with a comfortable pickup from your Dubai location. Experience the thrill of Hatta tracking through majestic mountains, followed by an exciting safari adventure. Explore the rich cultural heritage at the Heritage Village and visit the iconic Hatta Fort Hotel. Take a refreshing dip in the fresh water pool and browse through the vibrant carpet market. Complete your experience with an optional lunch before returning to Dubai. This tour offers the perfect blend of adventure, culture, and relaxation in the heart of the UAE's stunning landscape!

inclusions.pickup: Pickup from your hotel or residence in Dubai
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your hotel or residence in Dubai

additional_info.passport_note: Passport / Emirates ID is mandatory to carry during this trip
additional_info.pickup_note: Pick up can be arranged from other emirates with an extra surcharge

tours.title: Hot Air Balloon
tours.description: Experience the magic of floating above the Dubai desert in a hot air balloon! Witness breathtaking sunrise views and create unforgettable memories in the sky.

reviews.name: Emma Stone
reviews.comment: Magical hot air balloon experience! The sunrise views were breathtaking and the peaceful flight was incredible. The flight certificate was a nice touch.

reviews.name: Ryan Gosling
reviews.comment: Perfect balloon ride! The desert views from above were stunning and the sunrise was beautiful. The pilot was professional and the experience was unforgettable.

reviews.name: Natalie Portman
reviews.comment: Amazing hot air balloon adventure! The views were incredible and the peaceful flight was so relaxing. The light refreshment before the flight was nice.

tours.description2: Soar above the stunning Dubai desert in a hot air balloon for an unforgettable experience! Your adventure begins with a comfortable pickup from your location in Dubai. After a light refreshment, you'll board the balloon for a magical 45 to 60-minute flight over the desert conservation area. Witness the spectacular sunrise as you float peacefully above the golden sands, creating memories that will last a lifetime. After landing, you'll receive a flight certificate to commemorate your experience. This once-in-a-lifetime adventure is available every day, with convenient pickup and drop-off included from anywhere in Dubai.

inclusions.flight_duration: 45 to 60 Minutes Flight Over The Dubai Desert
inclusions.certificate: Flight Certificate Will Be Provided After The Landing

additional_info.transport: Pick-up & Drop-off Included from anywhere in Dubai

tours.title: Desert Safari + Dhow Cruise
tours.description: Experience the best of both worlds with our Desert Safari and Dhow Cruise combination! Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, cultural activities, and a romantic dinner cruise on Dubai Creek.

reviews.name: Chris Hemsworth
reviews.comment: Perfect combination package! The desert safari was thrilling and the dhow cruise was romantic. The dinner on the cruise was delicious and the views were amazing.

reviews.name: Scarlett Johansson
reviews.comment: Great combination experience! The desert activities were fun and the dhow cruise was relaxing. The dinner was excellent and the service was good.

reviews.name: Tom Holland
reviews.comment: Amazing combination tour! The desert safari was exciting and the dhow cruise was perfect for the evening. The dinner cruise was romantic and memorable.

tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable adventure that combines the excitement of the desert with the romance of a dinner cruise! Your journey begins with an exhilarating desert safari featuring 45 minutes of heart-pounding dune bashing in the Lahbab desert. Experience the thrill of camel riding and sandboarding, perfect for both adults and children. Immerse yourself in traditional activities like henna painting and sheesha smoking. Enjoy a sumptuous international buffet dinner with unlimited soft drinks, tea, and coffee, accompanied by mesmerizing belly dance and Tanura performances. Later, board our traditional dhow for a romantic dinner cruise along Dubai Creek. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a memorable evening, this combination package offers the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation.

desert_safari.dinner: International buffet dinner with unlimited soft drinks, tea, and coffee
